sect1.title: External Interfaces
sect1.para: The external interfaces are represented by the generated RTE based on the ZVLight_SstSr.xml sst file. ZVLight_SstSr.xml is exported from ZVLight_SST.xlsx with the mapping set in the ZVLight_SstSr.xsd file.

sect1.title: External Dependencies
sect1.para: ZVLight requests return of encryption result via KS functions Rte_Call_ZVLight_CompProt_AesGfaKeyEncrypt, Rte_Call_ZVLight_CompProt_AesGfaKeyPoll when need to encrypt data and poll results.
